description: ASAM OpenMATERIAL 3D Geometry Asset file definition.

metadata.description: The key meta information about the mapping table, including its identity, authorship, technical specifications, and legal details.

name.description: The display name of the material mapping table.

description.description: Short description of the mapping table in 2 - 3 sentences.

uuid.description: Universally unique identifier for the mapping table in 8-4-4-4-12 format, see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Universally_unique_identifier. The uuid stays the same, even if version is updated.

mappingVersion.description: The version number of the mapping table, following semantic versioning (e.g., '1.0.0').

openMaterialVersion.description: The version of the ASAM OpenMATERIAL 3D specification used, adhering to semantic versioning (e.g., '1.0.0').

copyright.description: Indicates copyright details, including the year and copyright holder (e.g., 'Â© 2024 ACME Inc.').

license.description: Describes the license for mapping table distribution. Use an SPDX identifier for open-source licenses (e.g., 'MIT'), or provide a URL or filename for proprietary licenses.

author.description: Lists the author(s) of the mapping table as a name, email, or company. Multiple authors should be comma-separated.

creationDate.description: The date and time of mapping table creation, formatted as YYYYMMDDTHHMMSSZ according to ISO 8601 (e.g., '20240703T101728Z').

items.description: Material name or RGB code. The RGB code represents color values in an ASAM OpenMATERIAL 3D assignment texture.
